suite.name: Verify Invalid Login Suite

kw.name: Launch Browser And Navigate To Url
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: Types the given text into the Username field Examples: | Enter Username | Admin | | Enter Username | John |

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Types the given text into the Password field Examples: | Enter Password | Admin | | Enter Password | John |

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Login
kw.doc: Clicks on the login button Examples: | Click Login |

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validate Invalid Login Error Message
kw.doc: Verifies the invalid error message. Examples: | Validate Invalid Login Error Message | Invalid Username name |

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//p[contains(normalize-space(),'Invalid')]' contains exact text 'Invalid credentials'.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

suite.doc: This suite file validates valid login of the employee and admin which connects to scenario SC_02 and test case TC02
